participant_1.background:
My family is supportive of my career choices.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.
I met the most interesting people while filming my documentary.
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
i like alternative rock.

participant_2.background:
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods.
I have several barn cats, they are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.
I have more important things to focus on than my appearance.
My art is a great way to express myself and connect with others.

content.text: What's up? I'm trying to focus on my writing today.
Hi! I'm having coffee in the woods to start my day, then I'll try to do some art.
Sounds like a great way to start the day. I wish I had the opportunity to work outside!
I love my job, but sometimes I miss working in an office. It would be nice to have a desk and a computer!
I have a desk and a computer but I love being outside! I ride my bike every day to keep fit and clear my head.
That's a great way to stay healthy! I have several barn cats, they're my best friends!
I love animals! I have two dogs, a cat, and a fish. My pets are the best things in my life.
Animals are great! I've always loved them. I've seen some amazing animals in my travels. My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.
Wow, that's incredible! I've never seen a great white shark in person. I've been to South Africa, but I was only in the cities.
I've been lucky enough to travel a lot. I love seeing new places and meeting new people.
Me too! Traveling is one of my favorite things to do. It's so great to experience different cultures.
I totally agree! I love learning about new cultures and ways of life.
